name: Hex Color Match: Funny Puzzle
description:
Hex Color Match: Funny Puzzle is a very exciting game which has designed with cool colors blocks dice puzzles. This new dice puzzle game contains different types hexa of blocks puzzles which check your quick reaction ability and also help you to increase your brain power by setting different blocks in board to merge them and complete the level.
Features
• Easy to play.
• Play simple matching games.
• Play simple puzzle block quests.
• Easy to understand and fun to become dice master of matching games.
• Match hexa blocks exactly in this addicting brain training puzzles game.
• Play anywhere without wifi and internet.
